q1.question: Is this really a one-time payment?
q1.answer: Yes! Pay once, use forever. All future updates included at no extra cost.

q2.question: Does it work offline?
q2.answer: Absolutely. HippoMind works 100% offline. No internet connection required, ever.

q3.question: What about my data?
q3.answer: Your data never leaves your computer. Everything is stored locally. Zero telemetry, zero tracking.

q4.question: Can I use it on multiple computers?
q4.answer: Yes! Your license works on all your devices (macOS, Windows, Linux).

q5.question: What if I need help?
q5.answer: Premium email support included. We typically respond within 24 hours.

q6.question: Is there a refund policy?
q6.answer: Yes. 30-day money-back guarantee, no questions asked.
